pkgmetadata.longdescription: This SDK is no longer maintained or supported by Microsoft. Check out the `Python OpenCensus SDK <https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/app/opencensus-python>`_ for Azure Monitor's latest Python investments. Azure Monitor only provides support when using the `supported SDKs <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/app/platforms#unsupported-community-sdks>`_. Weâ€™re constantly assessing opportunities to expand our support for other languages, so follow our `GitHub Announcements <https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-Announcements/issues>`_ page to receive the latest SDK news.
